snippet.title: Ember & Isabelle - Game Trailer
snippet.description:
A charming interactive story about the relationship between a girl and a spirit, with outstanding colorful art style and graphics!

Follow the playful spirit Ember and the timid girl Isabelle on a fantasy adventure in the kingdom of sunsets!

Choose how you want to shape your story! Be good, evil or whatever fits you - all your actions have consequences in the story and will lead to a dozen unique endings!

Learn more about Ember & Isabelle! https://gamejolt.com/games/emberandisabelle/380482

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Witfon1
